description: Manifested Armor now also attacks with {Forgebreath}, a fire spell that deals 60 fire damage to all enemies in a cone in front of it. 3 second cooldown.

ma6hdr-12.name: Bellow
description: {Forgebreath} deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) in a larger area.
reminderText: {Forgebreath} is a spell that deals 60 fire damage to all enemies hit.

ma6hdr-13.name: Forged Fire
description: {Forgebreath} has additional ignite chance and a shorter cooldown.

ma6hdr-14.name: Heated Metal
description: Manifested Armor's melee attacks have a chance to ignite enemies.

ma6hdr-15.name: Whirlwind
description:
Manifested Armor gains the ability to use {Whirlwind Strike}, a spinning attack which hits all nearby enemies multiple times and travels a short distance. 

This effect has a 4 second cooldown.

ma6hdr-16.name: Steel Greaves
description: Manifested Armor gains increased effect of stats from your boots.

ma6hdr-17.name: Warstomp
description: Manifested Armor has a chance to taunt nearby enemies each second.

ma6hdr-18.name: Thick Padding
description: Manifested Armor cannot be stunned.

ma6hdr-19.name: Dash Boots
description: Manifested Armor gains a charge ability, which deals physical damage and knocks back any enemy it passes through. 6 second cooldown.

ma6hdr-20.name: Lethargy
description: Manifested Armor has a chance to slow attacking enemies when hit.

ma6hdr-21.name: Iron Grasp
description: Manifested Armor gains increased effect of stats from your gloves.

ma6hdr-22.name: Sharpened Metal
description: Manifested Armor's melee physical attacks have a chance to cause enemies to bleed.

ma6hdr-23.name: Sharper Metal
description: Manifested Armor deals more physical damage over time (multiplicative with other modifiers).

ma6hdr-24.name: Bladed Armour
description: Manifested Armor's melee attacks have a chance to reduce enemy armor.

ma6hdr-25.name: Redistributed Steel
description: Manifested Armor deals more damage, but has less armor (multiplicative with other modifiers).

ma6hdr-26.name: Titan Sword
description: Manifested Armor gains a sword which scales with your equipped weapon's stats.

multis-2.name: Way of the Sword
description: Armament stacks last longer and grant you additional melee physical damage per stack.

multis-3.name: Guarding Stance
description: You have additional armor and block effectiveness per stack of Armament.

multis-4.name: Bladed Focus
description: When you drop below 0 mana, you consume all stacks of Armament to restore mana per stack.

multis-5.name: Flanking Strikes
description: When you have 0 stacks of Armament you have an additional sword when using Multistrike, as if you had 1 stack.

multis-6.name: Hallowed Arsenal
description:
Each additional sword is replaced with {Smite}.

Smite cast this way costs its full mana cost per cast.

multis-7.name: Vengeful
description:
You have a chance to retaliate with Multistrike swords on block. 

This effect has a 3 second cooldown and doesn't include the initial strike.

multis-8.name: Echoed Warfare
description: Multistrike attacks repeated by your {Echoes} have additional swords.
reminderText:
This only affects the echoed Multistrike, not the original use.

Echoing is a Void Knight mastery bonus. It grants you a chance for your attacks to repeat after a second. This node's echo bonus has no effect unless become a Void Knight.

multis-9.name: Initiate
description: The initial strike deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

multis-10.name: Path of the Knight
description: Multistrike deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per 30 armor, up to a maximum.

multis-11.name: Heated Forge
description: Directly using {Forge Strike} consumes all stacks of Armament to summon additional {Forged Weapons} per stack.

multis-12.name: Forgemastery
description: Multistrike has a chance to consume a stack of Armament while at maximum stacks to summon a {Forged Weapon}.

multis-13.name: Hack and Slash
description: You now strike twice with Multistrike, but the full attack takes significantly longer. Each additional sword is now replaced with an axe that strikes its target twice.
reminderText: This effect still counts as using Multistrike once.

multis-14.name: Alpha Cuts
description: Improves Multistrike's base critical strike chance.

multis-15.name: Bladestorm
description: Multistrike consumes mana per stack of Armament to refresh existing stacks and create an additional sword per stack.
reminderText: This effect only works while you are on positive mana.

multis-16.name: Relentless Advance
description: Multistrike has increased attack speed.

multis-17.name: Determination
description: Multistrike deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) while you are at maximum stacks of Armament.

multis-18.name: Blitz
description: Multistrike penetrates enemy physical resistance.

multis-19.name: Decimate
description: Multistrike hits have a chance to bleed enemies per stack of Armament.

multis-20.name: Guillotine
description: Multistrike deals more melee damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per stack of bleed up to a maximum.

multis-21.name: Jousting
description:
Each additional sword is replaced with a spear, which stabs in an elongated area rather than a slash.

This has no effect if swords are already converted to axes.

multis-22.name: Sweeping Blows
description: Created swords can strike enemies further away.

multis-23.name: Victory Strikes
description:
If a sword kills an enemy it will create an additional sword to strike another enemy.

This effect cannot be triggered from additional swords created this way.

multis-24.name: Perfect Steel
description: You can have an additional maximum stack of Armament.

multis-25.name: Doctrine of the Anvil
description: You can have an additional maximum stack of Armament, but Multistrike has less attack speed per stack (multipicative with other modifiers).

multis-26.name: Fiery Justice
description: While at maximum stacks of Armament and positive mana, attacking with Multistrike will consume all stacks and 40 mana to use {Forge Strike}.

multis-27.name: Aggressive Cadence
stats: Additional Sword At Max Stacks With 2h
description: Multistrike has an additional sword while you are at maximum stacks of Armament and wielding a two-handed weapon.

multis-28.name: Nullifying Carve
description: {Void Cleave} consumes all stacks of Armament to gain more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and increased area per stack consumed.

pa67ju-1.name: Sanctified Serenity
description: {Consecrated Ground} has increased healing effectiveness.
reminderText: This stacks additively with other sources of increased healing effectiveness and is taken into account for Consecrated Ground's bonus spell damage per increased healing effectiveness.

pa67ju-2.name: Lingering Force
description: {Consecrated Ground} lasts longer.

pa67ju-3.name: Anointed
description: {Consecrated Ground} becomes a {Consecrating Aura} which surrounds you, but Judgement costs more mana and has a longer cooldown.

pa67ju-4.name: Destructive Impact
description: {Consecrated Ground} heals allies and deals damage in a larger area.

pa67ju-5.name: Holy Eruption
description: When {Consecrated Ground} finishes, it casts {Holy Eruption}, dealing fire damage to all nearby enemies and heals you and all your nearby allies for 80 health.

pa67ju-6.name: Holy Blast
description: {Holy Eruption} deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and restore more health.

pa67ju-7.name: Cleansing Light
description: {Holy Eruption} cleanses negative ailments, such as ignite and chill, on you and allies.
reminderText: {Holy Eruption} deals 30 fire damage to all nearby enemies and heals all nearby allies for 50 health.

pa67ju-8.name: Expedite
description: {Consecrated Ground} restores more health, but has a shorter duration.

pa67ju-9.name: Sanctification
description: Judgement now pulls in enemies and slows them, but its initial hit no longer deals damage.

pa67ju-10.name: Flaming Soul
description: {Consecrated Ground} deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

pa67ju-11.name: Ashes To Dust
description: {Consecrated Ground} has a chance to shred enemy armor each second.

pa67ju-12.name: Divine Destruction
stats: +20% Conscrated Ground Damage Against High Health
description: Judgement hits and {Conscrated Ground} deal more damage against enemies at high health (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: Targets above 65% max health are considered to be at high health.

pa67ju-13.name: Scourgebane
stats: +20% Hit Damage Against Rares And Bosses
description: Judgement hits deal more hit damage to rare and boss enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).

pa67ju-14.name: Sigil of Sacrifice
description: Judgement consumes all of your {Sigils of Hope} to deal additional fire damage for each Sigil consumed.
reminderText: Consecrated Ground is affected by the spell fire damage gained per sigil.

pa67ju-15.name: Pious Offering
description: Judgement now also consumes a percentage of your current mana and deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per mana consumed.

pa67ju-16.name: Ascendant Liturgy
description: Judgement gains significant physical and fire penetration, but no longer leaves behind {Consecrated Ground}.

pa67ju-17.name: Proclamation
description: Judgement deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and has an increased chance to stun enemies.

pa67ju-18.name: Righteous Decree
description: Judgement also casts {Smite} at nearby enemies. Smite consumes mana equal to its mana cost for each cast.

pa67ju-19.name: Sacred Sword
description: Judgement hits have a chance to ignite enemies and ignites applied by Judgement have additional Fire Penetration.

pa67ju-20.name: Warrior's Tithe
description: Judgement's melee attack heals you and nearby allied players for each enemy it hits. This healing is affected by your increased healing effectiveness.
reminderText: All allied players within 15 metres are healed.

pa67ju-21.name: Purifying Flame
stats: +30% Conscrated Ground Damage Against Ignited Enemies
description: Judgement hits and {Consecrated Ground} deal more damage against ignited enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).

pa67ju-22.name: Fervent Impact
description: Judgement hits have more critical strike chance against ignited enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).

pa67ju-23.name: Punish
description: Judgement critical strikes deal more damage.

pa67ju-24.name: Swift Verdict
description: Judgement has a shorter cooldown and a lower mana cost.

pa67ju-25.name: Prophesied Immolation
stats: +1% Fire Damage per 10% Increased Healing Effectiveness
description: Judgement's melee attack cannot be dodged and deals more fire damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) based on your increased healing effectiveness.
reminderText: This fire damage modifier also applies to any ailments Judgement's melee attack inflicts, such as Ignite.

pa67ju-26.name: Ensuing Fervour
description: You gain Frenzy for a duration after using Judgement if it hits at least one enemy.

pa67ju-27.name: Deliverance
description: If you hit at least one enemy with Judgement you gain the {Deliverance} buff, which drastically increases mana regen and health regen.

pa67ju-28.name: Holy War
description: While you have the {Deliverance} buff whenever you directly use Vengeance, Rive, or Multistrike and hit at least one enemy you regain additional mana.

pa67ju-29.name: Urgent Inquisition
description: Judgement no longer has a cooldown, but costs substantially more mana. Its mana cost now counts as mana consumed for the effect of the {Pious Offering} node.

re82ke-2.name: Regenerative Shell
description: You have increased health regeneration while channelling Rebuke.

re82ke-3.name: Mystic Aegis
description: Rebuke has a shorter cooldown, but costs more mana.

re82ke-4.name: Brave the Elements
description: You take less elemental damage while channelling Rebuke (multiplicative with other modifiers).

re82ke-5.name: Augmented Plating
description: You have more armor (multiplicative with other modifiers) while channelling Rebuke.

re82ke-6.name: Bide
description: Rebuke's maximum duration is increased, allowing you to absorb more damage.

re82ke-7.name: Burst of Speed
description: After you finish channelling Rebuke you gain the {Haste} buff, attack speed, and cast speed for a duration equal to half the duration you channelled Rebuke for.

re82ke-8.name: Redemption
description: You heal yourself and nearby allies each second while channelling Rebuke.

re82ke-9.name: Solemn Vow
description: Buffs via the {Burst of Speed} and {Protective Legacy} nodes last longer after you finish channelling Rebuke.

re82ke-10.name: Battle Meditation
description: You have increased mana regeneration while channelling Rebuke.

re82ke-11.name: Retaliation
description: Rebuke hits deal more damage, and Rebuke hits in a larger area.

re82ke-12.name: Wildfire Shell
description: While channelling Rebuke, you have a chance to apply {Spreading Flames} to nearby enemies each second.
reminderText: This chance is rolled individually for each nearby enemy.

re82ke-13.name: Singed Shield
description: You have a chance to ignite nearby enemies each second while channelling Rebuke.

re82ke-14.name: Unforge
description: You have a chance to reduce nearby enemy armor each second while channelling Rebuke.

re82ke-15.name: Lingering Ailments
description: Ignite, armor shred, and spreading flames applied to enemies while channelling Rebuke last longer.

re82ke-16.name: Dark Thoughts
description: Rebuke hits deal additional base void damage.

re82ke-17.name: Voidfused Barrier
description:
Rebuke hits have a chance to grant you a {Void Essence}.

Void Essences last 7 seconds and grant 15% increased void damage, 15% increased melee damage, and 10% reduced stun duration.

You can have a maximum of 3 Void Essences at once.

re82ke-18.name: Infinite Guardian
description: Rebuke has an increased maximum duration, allowing you to absorb more damage, but has a longer cooldown.

re82ke-19.name: Accelerated Healing
description: While channeling Rebuke the healing from the {Redemption} node increases each second.

re82ke-20.name: War Priest
stats: 4% Increased Healing Per Point Of Attunement
description: Healing via the {Redemption} node now also scales with your attunement.

re82ke-21.name: Protective Legacy
description: The buffs you are granted via the {Augmented Plating} and {Brave the Elements} nodes now persist after you finish channelling Rebuke. Their duration is equal to half the duration you channelled Rebuke for.

re82ke-22.name: Inner Focus
description: Regenerate mana when you are hit while channelling Rebuke.

re82ke-24.name: Reclaimed Refuge
description:
You reduce a portion of Rebuke's remaining cooldown when you use a different melee attack and hit at least one enemy.

This effect can only occur a limited number of times per use of Rebuke, and the effect is doubled while wielding a two handed weapon.

re82ke-25.name: Stoic Challenge
description: Rebuke now has an additonal charge.

rs31hi-1.name: Reinforcement
description: You summon additional shields.

rs31hi-2.name: Healing Shields
description: Every 6 seconds each Shield heals nearby allies.

rs31hi-3.name: Phalanx
description: When Shields heal allies, they also increase their armor for 4 seconds. This effect does not stack.

rs31hi-4.name: Sturdy Shields
description: When Shields heal allies, they also grant them a non stacking increased block effectiveness buff for 4 seconds.
reminderText: You can only receive buffs from a single shield at a time. Increasing the number of shields will not increase the stats received. Shields do also buff each other.

rs31hi-5.name: On the Path
description: While using {Warpath}, your Shields spin faster and take less damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

rs31hi-6.name: Aegis of Life
description: Shields have increased healing effectiveness.

rs31hi-7.name: Tempered Steel
description: Ring of Shields costs less mana, but Shields have reduced health.

rs31hi-8.name: Martyr Shields
description: You are healed any time one of your Shields dies.

rs31hi-9.name: Collateral Damage
description: Shields shatter into {Shrapnel} when they die, dealing physical damage to surrounding enemies.

rs31hi-10.name: Heavy Shrapnel
description: {Shrapnel} created by your dying Shields has a signficantly increased chance to stun enemies.
reminderText: {Shrapnel} deals physical damage to surrounding enemies.

rs31hi-11.name: Defensive Shields
description: You have additional chance to block and a higher block effectiveness if you have cast Ring of Shields recently (last 4 seconds).

rs31hi-12.name: Iron Form
description: You are invulnerable for 1 second after casting Ring of Shields, but you cannot move or use abilities.

rs31hi-13.name: Rush Wall
description: While using {Shield Rush}, your Shields form a wall in front of you, increasing the area you hit.

rs31hi-14.name: Heavy Burden
description: Shields have a chance to slow enemies that hit them.

rs31hi-15.name: Pulsing Shields
description: Shields push enemies away from you every 4 seconds.

rs31hi-16.name: Banding
description: Shields have increased health and additional physical resistance.

rs31hi-17.name: Enduring Defense
description: Ring of Shields lasts longer.

rs31hi-18.name: Coating
description: Consuming a potion also heals your Shields.

rs31hi-19.name: Shield Spike
description: Shields reflect a percentage of damage taken to attackers.

rs31hi-20.name: Molten Shields
stats: 50% Chance To Ignite Enemy When Hit
description:
Shields take less fire damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), and have a chance to ignite enemies that hit them. 

If you have the {Collateral Damage} node the base physical damage of the {Shrapnel} it creates is converted to fire damage.
reminderText: The only direct source of damage that Ring of Shields can do is with the Shrapnel node.

rs31hi-21.name: Immolation
description: Shields now deal fire damage over time to surrounding enemies.
reminderText: Scales with the Shield's increases to spell damage and damage over time.

rs31hi-22.name: Fire Spin
description: Shields deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and shields rotate faster.

rs31hi-23.name: Touched by Fire
description: You deal additional fire damage with spells and attacks if you have cast Ring of Shields recently (last 4 seconds).

rs31hi-24.name: Bastion
description: Shields rotate around you at a greater distance.

rs31hi-26.name: Amass
description: Ring of Shields summons additional Shields, but costs more mana.

rs31hi-27.name: Displacement
description: Ring of Shields is cast at your target location instead, but Shields no longer follow you. Shields have more health (multiplicative with other modifiers) and last much longer.
reminderText: The health increase is multiplicative with other modifiers

rs31hi-28.name: Wreathed in Flame
description: You deal increased melee fire damage if you have cast Ring of Shields recently (last 4 seconds).

sb4h-0.name: Shield Bash
description:
A melee directional attack that that stuns enemies for 1 second. 100% increased stun chance against non-boss enemies.

1% more damage per 1% block chance (up to 100%, multiplicative with other modifiers).

sb4h-1.name: Dazed
description: Stuns caused by Shield Bash last longer.

sb4h-2.name: Wall of Shields
description: If Shield Bash is used while Ring of Shields is active, the shields form a wall which increases the width of Shield Bash, based on the number of active shields.
reminderText: The wall can be up to a maximum of 7 shields wide.

sb4h-3.name: Refreshing Smash
description: You are granted health when you stun an enemy with Shield Bash.

sb4h-4.name: Splintering Blow
description:
If Shield Bash is used while you have a shield equipped, it fires shield fragments in a cone in front of you.

While Shield Bash is on cooldown you cannot block.

Only works if Shield Bash has a cooldown.
reminderText: Shield Fragments deal melee damage, and added melee damage applies to them at 150% effectiveness.

sb4h-5.name: Survival of the Fittest
stats: +1 Health Gain On Stun Per Strength
description: You are granted health per point of Strength, when you stun an enemy with Shield Bash.

sb4h-6.name: Broadened Shield
description: Shield Bash deals damage in a wider area.

sb4h-7.name: Disarming Blows
description: Shield Bash now applies {Frailty} to enemies hit.

sb4h-8.name: Flame Coating
stats: +25% Max Fire Damage Bonus From Block Chance
description:
Shield Bash deals additional melee fire damage.

If Shield Bash has a cooldown, it also deals more fire damage per block chance (multiplicative with other modifiers) up to 100%.

sb4h-9.name: Kindling
description:
Shield Bash causes your next melee or throwing attack to have additional ignite chance and critical strike chance. Excludes channelled skills.

This effect is significantly reduced if Shield Bash does not have a cooldown.

sb4h-10.name: Incinerating Blows
description:
Shield Bash no longer has a guaranteed stun, but instead applies additional stacks of ignite. All stun duration modifiers from this tree are converted to affect ignite duration instead.

Shield Bash's base physical damage is converted to fire. Consequently this damage scales with increases to fire damage, but not increases to physical damage. 

Swaps Shield Bash's {Physical} tag for a {Fire} tag.

sb4h-11.name: Protective Impact
description: Shield Bash grant you additional block chance and block effectiveness for a short duration after use.

sb4h-12.name: Power Rush
stats: Shield Bash After Shield Rush Or Lunge
description:
After you use Shield Rush or Lunge, you Shield Bash in the direction you traveled.

Shield Bash must have a cooldown, be charged and on your action bar for this effect to work.

sb4h-13.name: Perfect Bulwark
description:
For 4 seconds after using Shield Bash, you are guaranteed to block a limited number of hits.

Only works if Shield Bash has a cooldown.

sb4h-14.name: Block Out
description: Shield Bash now also blinds enemies hit.

sb4h-15.name: Rebounding
description: Your next {Shield Throw} can ricochet 5 additional times, after using Shield Bash.

sb4h-16.name: Hindrance
description: Shield Bash now also slows enemies.

sb4h-17.name: Breadth
description: Shield Bash deals damage in a longer area.

sb4h-18.name: Conjurer
description: Shield Bash will cause one enemy that was hit to drop a potion if Shield Bash has a cooldown.

sb4h-19.name: Impeded Movement
description: Slows caused by Shield Bash last longer.

sb4h-20.name: Staggering Punch
description: Shield Bash now also knocks enemies back, if Shield Bash has a cooldown.

sb4h-21.name: Double Bash
description: You gain an additional charge of Shield Bash, but it has a longer cooldown.

sb4h-22.name: Fusillade
description: Using Shield Bash consumes all charges and deals significantly more damage per extra charge consumed (multiplicative with other modifiers).

sb4h-23.name: Steel Coating
description: Shield Bash deals additional melee physical damage.

sb4h-24.name: Juggernaut
description: Shield Bash no longer requires a shield to use, but costs more mana.

sb4h-25.name: Cutting Edge
description: Shield Bash reduces enemy armor and costs less mana.

sb4h-26.name: Serrating Strikes
description: Shield Bash causes enemies to bleed, but costs more mana.

sb4h-27.name: Iron Arms
description: Shield Bash deals more physical damage per point of Strength (multiplicative with other modifiers).

sb4h-28.name: Flurry of Blows
description: Shield Bash no longer has a cooldown, but costs significantly more mana and no longer has a guaranteed stun or ignite.

sb4h-29.name: High Impact
description: Shield Bash deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

sb4h-30.name: Concussive Attacks
description: Shield Bash has an increased chance to stun and stuns it inflicts last longer.

sb4h-32.name: Indomitable Force
description: Shield Bash has added melee damage based on your block effectiveness.

sb4h-34.name: Shieldstorm
description: Shield Bash has increased attack speed scaling with your block chance up to a maximum.

si4lgl-2.name: Word of Alacrity
description: Sigils of Hope has increased cast speed and heals you on cast.

si4lgl-3.name: Exigency
description: Sigils of Hope is cast instantly, but costs more mana and gains a cooldown.

si4lgl-4.name: Word of Power
description: You deal increased melee damage for 3 seconds after you cast Sigils of Hope.

si4lgl-5.name: Burning Sign
description: Sigils grant you and your allies a chance to ignite enemies.

si4lgl-6.name: Last Wish
stats: 6% Chance To Summon Sigil On Kill
description: You have a chance to summon a Sigil when you kill an enemy.

si4lgl-7.name: Invigorate
description: Sigils grant you and your allies increased healing effectiveness.

si4lgl-8.name: Quiet Mind
description: Sigils of Hope costs less mana.

si4lgl-9.name: Polygram
description: You can summon an additional Sigil. Does not override Soliloquy.

si4lgl-10.name: Faith
description: If you take a hit that deals more than 25% of your health, a Sigil is consumed, healing you for 200 health.

si4lgl-11.name: Renewed Hope
description: When a Sigil is consumed by any effect, you have a chance to automatically summon a new Sigil.

si4lgl-12.name: Healing Rites
description: When a Sigil is consumed, you are granted healing effectiveness for a duration. This effect can stack.

si4lgl-13.name: Fervor
description: When {Faith} triggers, you are granted {Haste} for 2 seconds.

si4lgl-14.name: Unwavering Faith
description: {Faith} restores more health and requires less health lost to trigger.

si4lgl-15.name: Iron Sigils
description: Sigils grant you and your allies additional endurance threshold

si4lgl-16.name: Soliloquy
description: Your Sigils grant a significant amount of fire and void resistance, but your maximum Sigils is set to 1.

si4lgl-17.name: Divine Flare
description: Casting Sigils of Hope while you have an active Sigil consumes it to cast {Divine Flare}, an explosive spell which deals fire damage to nearby enemies.

si4lgl-18.name: Waves of Light
description: Divine Flare chains to additional enemies, but costs mana every time it chains.

si4lgl-19.name: Consecrating Flare
description: {Divine Flare} deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: {Divine Flare} is an explosive spell which deals 25 fire damage to surrounding enemies.

si4lgl-20.name: Well of Light
description: {Divine Flare} also heals nearby allies within its range.
reminderText: {Divine Flare} is an explosive spell which deals 25 fire damage to surrounding enemies.

si4lgl-21.name: Cleansing Light
description: {Divine Flare} has a chance to cleanse negative ailments from allies it hits.
reminderText: {Divine Flare} is an explosive spell which deals 25 fire damage to surrounding enemies.

si4lgl-22.name: Energized Flare
description: {Divine Flare} deals additional fire damage for each second the Sigil was active.
reminderText: {Divine Flare} is an explosive spell which deals 25 fire damage to surrounding enemies.

si4lgl-23.name: Enduring Hope
description: Sigils last longer.

si4lgl-24.name: Meditation
description: Sigils now only affect you, but provide twice as much health regeneration.

si4lgl-25.name: Inspire Hope
description: Sigils of Hope may now be cast on allies. Any effects from this tree will now be granted to the recipient(s) of the Sigils.

si4lgl-26.name: Sign of the Guardian
description: Sigils grant additional block chance and block effectiveness.

si4lgl-28.name: Tetragram
description: You can summon an additional Sigil. Does not override Soliloquy.

si4lgl-29.name: Decree of Flame
description: Sigils grant you and your allies additional fire damage.

si4lgl-30.name: Sigils of Despair
stats: 15% Increased Void Damage Per Active Sigil
Sigils Do Not Increase Health Regen
description: Fire damage provided by Sigils is converted to void damage. Each Sigil now grants 15% increased void damage, but no longer increases health regeneration.

si4lgl-32.name: Empowering Sigils
description: Sigils increase the damage of you and your allies.

sm87r4-2.name: Fissure
description:
Smite causes a {Fissure} underneath the target, dealing fire damage to enemies who stand on it.

{Fissure} costs 10 mana, last 3 seconds and has a 0.5 second cooldown.

sm87r4-3.name: Epicenter
description: {Fissure} deals damage in a larger area.
reminderText: {Fissures} are summoned at Smite targets, dealing fire damage in an area to enemies who stand on it.

sm87r4-4.name: Heavy Impact
description: {Fissure} deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: {Fissures} are created at Smite targets, dealing fire damage in an area to enemies who stand on it.

sm87r4-5.name: Six Feet Under
description: {Fissure} instantly kills enemies that are below a health threshold (percentage of their maximum health).
reminderText: If you have a similar effect from an item or passive node, then the highest threshold is used.

sm87r4-6.name: Aftershock
description: {Fissures} last longer, but Smite costs more mana.
reminderText: {Fissures} are summoned at Smite targets, dealing fire damage in an area to enemies who stand on it.

sm87r4-7.name: Descend
description: You appear at Smite's targeted location, dealing physical damage to surrounding enemies. Smite costs more mana, has a cooldown, and counts as a {Traversal} skill.
reminderText:
Descends damage scales with modifiers to spell damage.

Using a Traversal skill puts all other traversal skills on cooldown and traversal skills' cooldowns do not recover while you are using a traversal skill.

sm87r4-8.name: Forceful Impact
description: Smite hits knock enemies back.

sm87r4-9.name: Holy Wave
description: Smite heals in a larger area.

sm87r4-10.name: Righteous Fury
description: You deal additional melee fire damage if you have hit an enemy with Smite recently (last 4 seconds).

sm87r4-11.name: Righteous Flurry
description: You have increased attack and cast speed if you have hit an enemy with Smite recently (last 4 seconds).

sm87r4-12.name: Panacea
description: Being healed by Smite has a chance to cleanse all negative ailments, such as ignite and chill, from you and allies.

sm87r4-13.name: Desperate Measures
description: When you are out of mana Smite is free, but cannot heal, cleanse, or create {Fissures}.

sm87r4-14.name: Soothing Balm
description: Being healed by Smite grants you or your allies increased health and mana regeneration for 4 seconds (does not stack).

sm87r4-15.name: Pillars of Light
description: When you directly cast smite, you have a chance to double cast. The additional cast does not incur a mana cost and cannot teleport you if you have the Descend node.

sm87r4-16.name: Holy Fire
description: Smite hits have a chance to ignite enemies.

sm87r4-17.name: Conflagration
description: Smite hits deal more damage to ignited enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: Deals more Hit Damage to Electrified or Slowed enemies if converted to Lightning or Void respectively.

sm87r4-18.name: Immolate
description: Smite hits have a chance to apply {Spreading Flames}

sm87r4-19.name: Righteous Overload
description: Enemies killed by Smite have a chance to explode, dealing fire damage to nearby enemies.

sm87r4-20.name: Blinding Flash
description: Smite hits have a chance to blind enemies and deal more damage to blinded enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).

sm87r4-21.name: Order of Lagon
description:
Smite's base fire damage is converted to lightning. Consequently this damage scales with increases to lightning damage, but not increases to fire damage.

Ignite chance from all sources is converted to electrify chance for Smite and effects related to ignite now depend on electrify instead.
reminderText:
Secondary effects like Fissure and Spreading Flames are unaffected.

This node has no effect if Smite is already converted to void.

sm87r4-22.name: Unbalanced Scale
description: Smite hits also cast a {Lightning Bolt} at 3 nearby enemies, dealing lightning damage. Smite costs more mana.

sm87r4-23.name: Charged Hand
description: Electrify applied by Smite has increased duration and additional Lightning Penetration

sm87r4-24.name: Wandering Bolts
description: {Lightning Bolts} created by Smite hit additional enemies.

sm87r4-25.name: Conviction
description: Improves Smite's base critical strike chance, but Smite has reduced cast speed.

sm87r4-26.name: Deep Impact
description: Smite critical strikes deal more damage.

sm87r4-27.name: Grace
description: Smite heals allies for more health.

sm87r4-28.name: Atonement
description: The {Sacrifice} node costs less health.

sm87r4-30.name: Sacrifice
description: Smite deals significantly more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but Smite consumes a percent of your current health on cast.

sm87r4-31.name: Piety
description: Smite has a chance to {Electrify} on hit.

sndr1-2.name: Champion
description: Rive deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and has an increased chance to stun enemies.

sndr1-3.name: Bound Weapon
stats: 4% Forged Weapon chance on Hit vs Boss or Rare
description: When Rive kills an enemy or hits a boss or rare enemy, you have a chance to summon a {Forged Weapon}.

sndr1-4.name: Laceration
description:
Rive's third strike {lacerates} enemies on it.

Lacerated enemies take melee damage over time for 3 seconds, with base damage equal to 200% of your added melee damage. Laceration does not stack.
reminderText: Added melee damage of all types is taken into account for Lacerate, but added melee damage without a type is applied as physical. For example if you have +20 Melee Damage and +10 Melee Fire Damage, Lacerate's base damage will be 40 Physical and 20 Fire.

sndr1-5.name: Temporal Warrior
description: Rive deals more void damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and your chance to {Echo} with Rive is doubled.
reminderText: Echoing is a Void Knight mastery bonus. It grants you a chance for your attacks to repeat after a second. This node's echo bonus has no effect unless you are a Void Knight.

sndr1-6.name: Weapon Specialist
stats: +1 Physical Damage per Dexterity with a Sword
+1 Void Damage per Vitality with an Axe
+1 Fire Damage per Attunement with a Mace
description:
Rive deals additional melee physical damage per point of Dexterity if you are using a Sword.

Rive deals additional melee void damage per point of Vitality if you are using an Axe.

Rive deals additional melee fire damage per point of Attunement if you are using a Mace.

sndr1-7.name: Azure Crescendo
description: Rive's third strike deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and restores mana if it hits at least one target.

sndr1-8.name: Ripples of Oblivion
description: Rive deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers). This effect is tripled for {Echoes}.
reminderText: Echoing is a Void Knight mastery bonus. It grants you a chance for your attacks to repeat after a second. This node's echo bonus has no effect unless you are a Void Knight.

sndr1-9.name: Sever
description: Rive's first strike has a chance to ignite enemies.

sndr1-10.name: Twisting Fangs
description: Rive's second strike has a chance to ignite enemies.

sndr1-11.name: Flame Drinker's Blade
description: Rive's third strike consumes all stacks of ignite you applied to enemies it hits, granting you a buff that grants physical penetration per stack consumed, up to a maximum.
reminderText: Ignite stacks applied by your minions or allies are not consumed.

sndr1-12.name: Assassin's Sustenance
description: When you trigger {Flame Drinker's Blade's} effect you also gain an additional buff that causes you to leech a percentage of the damage you deal as health. Unlike the buff from Flame Drinker's Blade, this buff cannot stack.

sndr1-13.name: Savagery
stats: +15% More Hit Damage Vs Ignited Enemies
description: Rive hits deal more damage to ignited targets (multiplicative with other modifiers).

sndr1-14.name: Scrap Metal
description: Whenever you would summon a {Forged Weapon} from any source, you instead gain a stack of Scrap Metal. Each stack grants more armour and more damage with Rive (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: Scrap Metal stacks have a base duration of 10 seconds, but modifiers to Forged Weapon duration now apply to Scrap Metal duration as well.

sndr1-15.name: Flurry
stats: +8% First And Second Strike Attack Speed
description: Rive's first and second strike have increased attack speed.

sndr1-16.name: Concentration
stats: +1% First And Second Strike Base Crit Chance
description: Improves Rive's base critical strike chance. This bonus is doubled for Rive's third strike.

sndr1-17.name: Adrenaline
description: Rive's first strike grants you increased critical strike chance on hit for 4 seconds. Stacks up to 4 times.

sndr1-18.name: Focused Strike
stats: First And Second Strike Never Crit
description: Rive's third strike has double crit chance and its critical strikes deal more damage, but strikes one and two can no longer critically strike.

sndr1-19.name: Rending
stats: +30% First And Second Strike Armor Shred Chance
description: Rive's first and second strike have a chance to reduce enemy armor.

sndr1-20.name: Projection of War
description: Rive's first strike consumes mana to release a wave of energy that passes through enemies.

sndr1-21.name: Cadence
description: Changes Rive's sequence of strikes to {1, 2, 1, 2, 3.}

sndr1-22.name: Triple Threat
description: Rive's third strike deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and hits in a larger area, and has increased chance to stun enemies.

sndr1-23.name: Double Slash
description: Rive skips its third strike.

sndr1-24.name: Foe Cleaver
stats: +100% Effect of Damage Stats on a 2h Weapon
+100% Effect of Ailment Chance Stats on a 2h Weapon
description: If you are using a two handed weapon, stats on that weapon that directly add damage, increase damage or add a chance to apply an ailment on hit, have double effect for Rive.

sndr1-26.name: Iron Reach
description: Rive's second strike deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) in a larger area.

sndr1-27.name: Challenge
description: If you have positive mana, Rive's second strike pulls enemies, but costs more mana.
reminderText: The area in which enemies are pulled is affected by Increased Area for Area Skills stats.

sndr1-28.name: Outburst
description: Rive's third strike deals damage in a larger area.

sndr1-29.name: Reclamation
description: Rive's third strike leeches damage dealt as health.

sndr1-30.name: Brutality
description: Rive's third strike deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

sndr1-31.name: Massacre
stats: 10% Third Strike Detonate On Kill Chance
description: Rive's third strike has a chance to detonate enemies it kills, dealing fire damage to nearby enemies.

sndr1-32.name: Coup de Grace
description: Rive's third strike instantly kills enemies below a health threshold (a percentage of their maximum health).
reminderText: If you have a similar effect from an item or passive node then the highest threshold is used.

sr31hu-2.name: Consuming Path
description: Shield Rush deals more damage.

sr31hu-3.name: Will Breaker
stats: +30% Hit Damage Vs Full Health Enemies
description: Shield Rush hits deal more damage to enemies at full health (multiplicative with other modifiers).

sr31hu-4.name: Descent of the Void
description: When you cast Shield Rush you create a {Void Beam} that travels with you, which is a spell that deals void damage over time in a small area. Shield Rush costs more mana.

sr31hu-5.name: Dark Regression
description: When Shield Rush ends it creates a {Void Beam} that travels back in the direction you came from. Shield Rush costs more mana.
reminderText: {Void Beam} is a spell which deals void damage over time in its area of effect.

sr31hu-6.name: Dark Rush
description: Shield Rush no longer requires a shield and hits deal additional base void damage, but Shield Rush costs more mana.

sr31hu-7.name: Void Breaker
description: Shield Rush's final hit deals additional melee void damage.

sr31hu-8.name: Temporal Strike
stats: Damage Reduced By Increased Attack Speed %
description: Shield Rush hits deal additional void damage, but this damage is reduced by your increased attack speed.

sr31hu-9.name: Rush Mastery
description: Shield Rush costs less mana.

sr31hu-10.name: Protective Speed
description: You take less damage while using Shield Rush (multiplicative with other modifiers).

sr31hu-11.name: Unstoppable Charge
description: Shield Rush hits have an increased chance to stun enemies.

sr31hu-12.name: Desynchronous Charge
description: When Shield Rush ends, you return to the position you used it from.

sr31hu-13.name: Mana Memory
stats: Mana Restored When Shield Rush Ends
description: When Shield Rush ends, your mana is restored to the amount you had when it started, but Shield Rush now has a 10 second cooldown.

sr31hu-14.name: Endless Cycle
description: Shield Rush gains additional charges, but you take more damage while using Shield Rush (multiplicative with other modifiers).

sr31hu-15.name: The Rush of Sacrifice
description: Shield Rush no longer has a cooldown, but costs health in addition to mana to use.

sr31hu-16.name: Warrior's Entrance
description: Shield Rush's final attack deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) in a larger area.

sr31hu-17.name: Splintering Impact
description: Shield Rush's final hit deals more damage.

sr31hu-18.name: Critical Rush
description: Improves the base critical strike chance of Shield Rush's final hit.

sr31hu-19.name: Obliterating Rush
description: Critical strikes from Shield Rush's final hit deal more damage.

sr31hu-20.name: Echoes of the Charge
description: Shield Rush's final hit strikes a second time after a 0.5s delay, but Shield Rush hits deal less damage.

sr31hu-21.name: Stretched Time
description: Shield Rush's final hit echo deals significantly more damage, but the delay between the final hits is longer.

sr31hu-22.name: Critical Echo
stats: +4% Final Hit Echo Base Crit Chance
description: Improves the base critical strike chance of Shield Rush's final hit echo.

sr31hu-23.name: Obliterating Echo
description: Critical strikes from Shield Rush's final hit echo deal more damage.

st4th-2.name: Blacksmith's Breadth
description: Smelter's Wrath charges up faster to reach its maximum area sooner.
reminderText: This does not affect Smelter's Wrath's damage while charging.

st4th-3.name: Soldering Strike
description: Smelter's Wrath hits have a chance to ignite enemies for each second channelled.

st4th-4.name: Stinging Steel
description: Smelter's Wrath has additional critical strike chance for each second channelled.

st4th-5.name: Vulcanic Mastery
stats: Guaranteed Critical Strike At Full Charge
description: Smelter's Wrath is guaranteed to critically strike when fully charged.

st4th-6.name: Backdraft
description: When Smelter's Wrath is released, a duplicate attack is released in the opposite direction.
reminderText: This node has no effect if you have the Detonation node.

st4th-7.name: Heavy Strike
description: Smelter's Wrath deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) for each second channelled.

st4th-8.name: Bolster
description: While charging Smelter's Wrath you have more armor and endurance threshold (multiplicative with other modifiers)

st4th-9.name: Whetstone
description: Smelter's Wrath deals more melee damage and fire damage (multiplicative with other modifiers). These bonuses are increased by charging for longer.
reminderText: Melee fire damage benefits from both the melee and the fire damage bonuses from this node and they are multiplicative with each other.

st4th-10.name: Tempered Blows
description: Smelter's Wrath hits deal more damage (multiplciative with other modifiers) for each second channelled, but Smelter's Wrath charges more slowly.
reminderText: This charge speed modifier is also multiplicative with other modifiers

st4th-11.name: Tempering Blows
stats: +15% More Hit Damage Per Ignite Stack
description: Smelter's Wrath hits deal more damage to ignited enemies per stack of ignite, up to a maximum of 150%.  This effect is multiplicative with other modifiers.

st4th-12.name: Furnace
description: Smelter's Wrath spews {Furnace} while charging, a fire spell that deals damage over time in a cone to enemies.
reminderText: Furnace is not affected by stats per second charging.

st4th-13.name: Bellows
description: {Furnace} deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

st4th-14.name: Forged By Fire
description: {Furnace} has a chance to ignite enemies each second.

st4th-15.name: Quench
description: {Furnace} has a chance to slow enemies each second.

st4th-16.name: Liquefy
description: {Furnace} has a chance to reduce enemy armor each second.

st4th-17.name: Ferrous Smash
description: Smelter's Wrath hits have an increased chance to stun enemies per second channelled.

st4th-18.name: Rebuff
description: Smelter's Wrath hits knock back enemies a set distance based on how long you have channelled.

st4th-19.name: Axe Volley
description: When releasing a fully charged Smelter's Wrath you also release five throwing axes in a cone in front of you, a throwing attack dealing physical damage to enemies hit.

st4th-20.name: Bury The Hatchet
stats: +2% Axe Volley Hit Damage per Dexterity
description: {Axe Volley} hits deal more hit damage per point of Dexterity.

st4th-21.name: Brightsmith
stats: Increased Attack Speed -> Increased Critical Chance
description: Smelter's Wrath converts your increased attack speed to increased critical strike chance.

st4th-22.name: Valiance
stats: 20% More Hit Damage Against Rares And Bosses
description: Smelter's Wrath hits deal more damage to rare enemies and bosses (multiplicative with other modifiers).

st4th-23.name: Final Strike
description: Smelter's Wrath hits instantly kill enemies that are below a health threshold (a percentage of their maximum health). This kill threshold is doubled at maximum charge.
reminderText: If you have a similar effect from an item or passive node, then the highest threshold is used.

st4th-24.name: Forge Scale
description: Smelter's Wrath hits have a chance to shred enemies' armor for each second channelled.

st4th-25.name: Detonation
description: Smelter's Wrath now releases in a nova around you instead of a cone, but costs additional mana.

st4th-26.name: Crucible
description:
When fully charged, Smelter's Wrath leaves behind a {Burning Patch} for 6 seconds which ignites all enemies who stand in it each second.

Smelter's Wrath costs additional mana.

st4th-28.name: Sulphurous Sublimation
stats: 3% More Fire Damage Over Time per 1% Increased Area
Increased Area no longer affects Charge Speed
description: Increased Area for Area Skills stats no longer increases Smelter's Wrath's charge speed and instead grants its more fire damage over time (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: This bonus does affect the {Furnace} sub skill if you have the Furnace node.

st31io-2.name: Ricochet
description: Shield Throw has increased attack speed and ricochets to additional targets, but Shield Throw costs more mana.

st31io-3.name: Aegis
description: Shield Throw can target and ricochet to allies other than yourself. Allies are granted armor for 4 seconds when Shield Throw hits them.

st31io-4.name: Manifest Inspiration
stats: Manifest Armor Casts Sweeping Melee Attack When Hit
description:
If your {Manifest Armor} is hit by the shield, it performs a sweeping melee attack.
This attack cannot be triggered when the shield has no ricochets remaining.
reminderText: The attack scales with the Manifest Armor's stats.

st31io-5.name: Faithguard
description: {Aegis} also grants allies stun avoidance when Shield Throw hits them. The amount granted is equal to the armor Aegis provides.
reminderText: The amount of elemental and poison protection granted is the same as the amount of armour granted.

st31io-6.name: Testament of Light
stats: 6% Increased Aegis Effect Per Point Of Attunement
description: The benefits granted by {Aegis} are increased for each point of attunement you have.

st31io-7.name: Eruption
description: Whenever Shield Throw ricochets on an enemy it casts {Lava Burst,} a spell dealing fire damage to all enemies near the impact.
reminderText: Lava burst's damage scales with attunement and increases to fire damage and spell damage.

st31io-8.name: Forceful Breaking
description: {Lava Burst} deals damage in a larger area.

st31io-9.name: Magma Rage
description: {Lava Burst} deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

st31io-10.name: Forgeborn
description: Thrown shields travel faster, and Shield Throw deals additional throwing fire damage.
reminderText: Not affected by Shield Throw's increased effectiveness of added throwing attack damage

st31io-11.name: Molten Shield
stats: Increased Stun Chance -> Added Ignite Chance
description:
Shield Throw's base physical damage is converted to fire. Consequently this damage scales with increases to fire damage, but not increases to physical damage.

All increased stun chance from this tree is converted to added ignite chance.

st31io-12.name: Molten Toss
description: Shield Throw deals more fire damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

st31io-13.name: Burning Crusade
description: Shield Throw and {Lava Burst} hits have a chance to ignite enemies.

st31io-14.name: Polished Steel
description: Shield Throw costs less mana.

st31io-15.name: Focused Campaign
description: Shield Throw's cooldown is immediately reset when your shield returns to you, but the number of Shield Throw ricochets is halved (rounded down).

st31io-16.name: Armoring Aegis
description: Shield Throw grants you armor for 4 seconds when it ricochets.

st31io-17.name: Colossus
description: You have increased armor while Shield Throw is on cooldown.

st31io-18.name: Vampiric Shield
description: You gain health when Shield Throw ricochets.

st31io-19.name: Iron Monger
description: Shield Throw steals 10 armor on hit for 4 seconds.
reminderText: Armour stolen is added to your armour and removed from the target's armour.

st31io-20.name: Hemrin's Technique
description: Shield Throw ricochets to additional targets.

st31io-21.name: Heavy Shield
description: Shield Throw deals additional throwing damage.

st31io-22.name: Sharpened Rim
description: Improves Shield Throw's base critical strike chance.

st31io-23.name: Spiked Plates
description: Shield Throw deals more hit damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) equal to 50% of your block chance.

st31io-24.name: Rygar's Fury
stats: Cannot Block While Shield Throw Is Released
description: Shield Throw deals more hit damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) equal to 100% of your block chance, but you cannot block while Shield Throw is released.
reminderText: This stacks with {Spiked Plates} for a total of 150% of your block chance as more hit damage.

st31io-25.name: Crippling Throw
description: Shield Throw has a chance to slow and increased chance to stun enemies.

st31io-26.name: Throwing Arm
description: You are granted global increased throwing attack damage if you have used Shield Throw recently (last 4 seconds).

st31io-27.name: Fleet of Foot
description: When you cast Shield Throw, you are granted {Haste} for a duration.

st31io-28.name: Shield Barrage
description: Shield Throw no longer has a cooldown and costs less mana, but shields are smaller and deal less damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

st31io-29.name: Avenger's Wrath
description: Shield Throw critical hits deal more damage based on your block effectiveness.

v01cv-2.name: Riftflame
stats: 1% Fire Penetration with Ignite per 10% increased Void Damage
description:
Void Cleave hits ignite enemies and half of its base damage is converted to fire, meaning that this half of the damage scales with increases to fire damage but not with increases to void damage.

Ignite inflicted by Void Cleave gains additional fire penetration based on your increased void damage.

Void Cleave gains the {fire} tag.
reminderText: Generic increased damage is not taken into account for adding fire penetration for ignite. Neither is more void damage or increased melee void damage. Only increased void damage has any effect.

v01cv-3.name: Hellish Chasm
stats: Void Res -> Fire Res Shred Chance
+30% Damage On Next Fire Attack Or Spell
description:
All of Void Cleave's base void damage is converted to fire. Consequently this damage scales with increases to fire damage, but not increases to void damage.

Additionally your next non-channeled fire attack or spell after Void Cleave deals significantly more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

Void resistance shred chance from all sources is converted to fire resistance shred and effects related to void resistance shred now depend on fire resistance shred instead.

Void Cleave loses the {void} tag.

v01cv-4.name: Molten Blades
description: When you use Void Cleave and hit at least one enemy, your minions gain a stack of {Molten Infusion} for 4 seconds, granting them additional melee fire damage and a chance to ignite enemies.

v01cv-5.name: Scorching Path
stats: Molten Infusion Only On Minion Hit
description: Minions only gain a stack of {Molten Infusion} when you directly hit them with Void Cleave, but {Molten Infusion} has significantly increased effect.

v01cv-6.name: Abyssal Walker
description: You can travel farther with Void Cleave and it deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

v01cv-7.name: Momentum
description: After channelling {Warpath} for at least 2 seconds your next Void Cleave within 1 second deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

v01cv-8.name: Into the Depths
description: Void Cleave deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) in an increased area.

v01cv-9.name: Precognition
description: Improves Void Cleave's base critical strike chance and it cannot be dodged.

v01cv-10.name: Deadly Omen
description: Void Cleave deals more melee damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) to enemies on high health.
reminderText: Targets above 65% max health are considered to be at high health.

v01cv-11.name: Rift Maker
description: Void Cleave hits apply {Critical Vulnerability} and Void Cleave has increased critical strike chance.

v01cv-12.name: Champion of the Void
description: Void Cleave critical strikes deal more damage and you gain mana with Void Cleave critical strikes.

v01cv-13.name: Obliterator
description: If Void Cleave hits at least one enemy your next {Erasing Strike} is always a critical strike.

v01cv-14.name: Crushing Echo
description:
Void Cleave deals additional melee void damage. 

This effect is tripled for echoed Void Cleaves.

v01cv-15.name: Abolisher
stats: +50% Melee Void Damage To Low Health
description: Void Cleave deals significantly more melee void damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) to enemies on low health.
reminderText: Targets below 35% max health are considered to be at low health.

v01cv-16.name: Ruining Sweep
description: Void Cleave hits slow enemies, have increased stun chance and increased stun duration.

v01cv-17.name: Dark Pathway
description: Void Cleave has a shorter cooldown.

v01cv-18.name: Fraying Strikes
description: Void Cleave hits shred enemy void resistance.

v01cv-19.name: Resonating Cleave
description:
You cast {Abyssal Echoes} after using Void Cleave.

Abyssal Echoes cast this way uses its mana cost.

v01cv-20.name: Warped Decay
description: Void Cleave hits inflict enemies with {Time Rot}.

v01cv-21.name: Ravager
description: When you use Void Cleave you gain {Ravaging Aura} for a short duration scaling with the amount of enemies hit up to 10.

v01cv-22.name: Annuling Presence
description: {Ravaging Aura} deals additional spell void damage and has an increased area of effect.

v01cv-23.name: Endless Hunger
description: {Ravaging Aura} leeches a portion of the damage it deals as health.

v01cv-24.name: Dismantling Throws
stats: +1 Time Rot Stacks For Next Throwing
description: If Void Cleave hits at least one enemy your next throwing attack inflicts enemies with {Time Rot}.

v01cv-25.name: Entropic Blows
description: Void Cleave deals more melee damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per stack of {Time Rot} on the target.

v01cv-26.name: Armor Sunderer
description: Void Cleave hits shred enemy armor and {Armor Shred} applied by Void Cleave has increased effect and duration.

v01cv-27.name: Voidfused Projectiles
description: If Void Cleave hits at least one enemy your next throwing attack deals additional void damage.

v01cv-28.name: Nether Charge
description: You can store an additional charge of Void Cleave, but Void Cleave costs more mana.

v01cv-29.name: Vorpal Force
description: Void Cleave deals more melee damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per stack of bleed up to a maximum.
reminderText: This effect is based on ignite rather than bleed if you have the [Riftflame] node.

v01cv-30.name: Blazing Steel
description: Your increases to physical damage also apply to fire damage for Void Cleave.

v01cv-32.name: Gravity's Edge
description: You can travel much further with Void Cleave (multiplicative with other modifiers), but it has a longer cooldown and now counts as a {Traversal} skill.
reminderText: Using a Traversal skill puts all other traversal skills on cooldown and traversal skills' cooldowns do not recover while you are using a traversal skill.

va53st-2.name: Void Spiral
description:
Warpath deals additional melee void damage. 

This effect is doubled while wielding a 2 handed weapon.

va53st-4.name: Apocalypse Whirl
stats: Bleed And Ignite -> Time Rot Chance
description:
Warpath's base physical damage is converted to void. Consequently this damage scales with increases to void damage, but not increases to physical damage.

Warpath has a chance to inflict {Time Rot}. Bleed and ignite chance from all sources are converted to Time Rot chance for Warpath.

Swaps Warpath's {Physical} tag for a {Void} tag.
reminderText: The added chance is not affected by Warpath's reduction to ailment application chance, the converted chance is affected as normal.

va53st-5.name: Maw of the Deep
description: Warpath hits deal more damage against enemies per stack of {Time Rot} on them (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: {Time Rot} is an aliment that deals 45 void damage over time, increases stun duration by 5%, lasts 3 seconds, and stacks up to 12 times.

va53st-6.name: Juggernaut Stance
description: While spinning, you have additional block chance and block effectiveness.
reminderText: You can block without wielding a shield.

va53st-7.name: Battlemaster's Blade
description: Warpath deals damage in a larger area while wielding a two handed weapon.

va53st-8.name: Dark Nexus
description: While spinning, you gain mana every three seconds while wielding a two handed weapon.

va53st-9.name: Gorebringer
description:
Warpath hits have a chance to cause enemies to bleed and bleed stacks inflicted by Warpath have increased duration.

Both effects will instead apply to ignite or time rot if you have {Earthscorcher} or {Apocalypse Whirl}.
reminderText: The chance is not affected by Warpath's reduction to ailment application chance.

va53st-10.name: Earthscorcher
description:
Warpath's base physical damage is converted to fire. Consequently this damage scales with increases to fire damage, but not increases to physical damage.

Bleed chance from all sources is converted to ignite for Warpath.

Swaps Warpath's {Physical} tag for a {Fire} tag.
reminderText: This node has no effect if you have taken the {Apoclypse Whirl} node.

va53st-11.name: Path of Fire
stats: 1 Ignite Stacks In Trail Each Second
description: While spinning, you leave behind a burning trail that ignites enemies each second. If ignite has been converted to {Time Rot} with {Apoclypse Whirl} this trail inflicts Time Rot instead.
reminderText: The width of the trail does not scale with area modifiers.

va53st-12.name: Iron Reach
description: Warpath deals damage in a larger area.

va53st-13.name: Quicksilver Wind
description: While spinning, you have increased movement speed.

va53st-14.name: Whirling Steel
description:
Warpath deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

This effect is doubled while using a two handed weapon or dual wielding.

va53st-16.name: Path of Heavens
description: While spinning, you have additional spell damage.

va53st-17.name: Way of the Cleric
description: While spinning, you and your allies are healed each second within Warpath's area of effect. The amount of health gained is increased by healing effectiveness.

va53st-18.name: Winds of Justice
description:
While spinning, you have a chance to cast {Smite} each second on a nearby enemy.

This consumes Smite's mana cost.

va53st-19.name: Arsenal of Flame
description: Warpath hits deal more melee fire damage to ignited enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers) and ignite it inflicts has additional Fire Penetration

va53st-20.name: Warrior's Fury
description: For each second you continuously spin, Warpath deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) in a larger area, but costs more mana per second.

va53st-21.name: Giant Splitter
description: After spinning for at least 2 seconds you do a {Warslash} when you stop spinning. This deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) in a larger area for each second you spent spinning, up to a maximum duration.

va53st-22.name: Way of the Executioner
description: Warpath deals more melee damage to enemies on low health (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: Targets below 35% max health are considered to be at low health.

va53st-23.name: Unchained
description: Warpath costs less mana per second.

va53st-25.name: Cyclone of War
stats: +2% Global Melee Health Leech With Axe
+2% Global Base Critical Chance With Sword
description: While spinning, you have additional melee leech while wielding an axe, additional base crit chance while wielding a sword, additional physical penetration while wielding a mace and additional fire penetration while wielding a sceptre.

va53st-27.name: Reckless Spin
description: Warpath costs significantly less mana per second, but you have reduced elemental resistance while spinning.
reminderText: You can add resistances through other means to mitigate this reduction.

va53st-28.name: Molten Path
description: Warpath hits shred enemy armor.
reminderText: The chance is not affected by Warpath's reduction to ailment application chance.

va53st-29.name: Forgemaster Stance
description: While spinning, you summon {Forged Weapons} every 5 seconds as if you had hit an enemy with {Forge Strike}.

va53st-30.name: Moving Forge
description: While spinning, you summon {Forged Weapons} more frequently.

va53st-31.name: Echo Knight
description:
While spinning, you deal increased void damage and you have a chance each second to create an {Echo} at a recent location that uses Warpath on the spot for 2 seconds. This chance is equal to twice your chance for skills to echo.

You can only create a Warpath echo if you have been spinning for at least 2 seconds and have travelled at least 4 metres in the past 2 seconds.
reminderText: Echoing is a Void Knight mastery bonus. It grants you a chance for your attacks to repeat after a second. This node's echo bonus has no effect unless become a Void Knight.

va53st-32.name: Abyssal Tempest
description:
While spinning, you cast {Abyssal Echoes} every 5 seconds.

This consumes Abyssal Echoes' mana cost.

vr53sl-2.name: Incipient Void Rift
description: When you cast Volatile Reversal you leave behind a {Void Rift}, a spell which deals void damage in an area.

vr53sl-3.name: Disintegration
description: Volatile Reversal's {Void Rifts} deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).
reminderText: {Void Rift} is a spell which deals void damage in an area.

vr53sl-4.name: Time Rifts
description: Enemies hit by Volatile Reversal's {Void Rifts} take increased damage over time for 4 seconds.
reminderText: {Void Rift} is a spell which deals void damage in an area.

vr53sl-5.name: Shifting Power
description:
Volatile Reversal's {Void Rifts} have an increased chance to stun enemies.

After casting Volatile Reversal you gain a buff that causes you to deal more void damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) to stunned enemies. The duration of this buff is equal to the length of time you travelled back.

vr53sl-6.name: Terminal Void Rift
description: When you cast Volatile Reversal you create a {Void Rift} where you arrive.
reminderText: {Void Rift} is a spell which deals void damage in an area.

vr53sl-7.name: Dark Expanse
description: Volatile Reversal's {Void Rifts} deal damage in a larger area.
reminderText: {Void Rift} is a spell which deals void damage in an area.

vr53sl-8.name: Harbinger of Dust
description: Enemies hit by Volatile Reversal's {Void Rifts} take increased damage for 4 seconds.
reminderText: {Void Rift} is a spell which deals void damage in an area.

vr53sl-9.name: Food for Wyrms
stats: +1% Global Void Damage per Time Rot
description:
Volatile Reversal's {Void Rift} hits have a chance to inflict {Time Rot} on enemies.

After casting Volatile Reversal you gain a buff that causes you to deal more void damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per stack of Time Rot on the target. The duration of this buff is equal to the length of time you travelled back.

vr53sl-10.name: Time Sap
stats: 12% Chance to Recover Cooldown on Kill
4% Chance to Recover Cooldown on Boss Hit
description: You have a chance to recover a percentage of Volatile Reversal's remaining cooldown when you kill an enemy and when you hit a boss or rare enemy.

vr53sl-11.name: Catching Up
description: You gain movement speed after casting Volatile Reversal. The duration of this buff is equal to the length of time you travelled back.

vr53sl-12.name: Warped Time
description: You gain increased attack and cast speed after casting Volatile Reversal. The duration of this buff is equal to the length of time you travelled back.

vr53sl-13.name: Timelost Vitality
description: Volatile Reversal has a significantly shorter cooldown, but no longer restores health.

vr53sl-14.name: Volatile Travel
description: When you cast Volatile Reversal, you have an 80% chance to regain some of your missing health, but a 20% chance to lose some of your current health.

vr53sl-15.name: Traveller's Fatigue
description: Volatile Reversal has a shorter cooldown, but you have reduced health regeneration while Volatile Reversal is on cooldown.

vr53sl-16.name: Ancient Reversal
description: Volatile Reversal allows you to travel back further in time.

vr53sl-17.name: Traveller's Frailty
description: Volatile Reversal has a shorter cooldown, but you take increased damage while Volatile Reversal is on cooldown.

vr53sl-18.name: Timelost Wisdom
description: Volatile Reversal has a significantly shorter cooldown, but no longer restores mana.

vr53sl-19.name: Phased Reality
description: You gain dodge rating while Volatile Reversal is on cooldown.
